name: cfwhile
description: Loops while the condition is true or until break.

params.name: condition
params.description: A boolean condition that determines if the loop should continue.

params.name: label
params.description: Used to address loop from `break` or `continue` statement instead of innermost loop.

examples.title: Tag Syntax - without label
examples.description: Output the value of x while it is less than 5.

examples.title: Tag Syntax - with label in break
examples.description: An outer while loop can be broken from inside a nested loop if the correct label name is passed within the break tag.
examples.code:
<cfset row = 0/>
<cfwhile condition="#row LT 5#" label="outerLoop">
    <cfset col = 0/>
    <cfwhile condition="#col LT 5#" label="innerLoop">

        <cfif col EQ 3>
            <cfbreak/>
        <cfelseif row EQ 1>
            <cfbreak outerLoop/>
        </cfif>

        <cfoutput>[#row#, #col#]</cfoutput>

        <cfset col = col + 1/>
    </cfwhile>
    <cfset row = row + 1/>
</cfwhile>
